movieInfo:
Directed by: Siva Rama Raju Kanumuri
Starring by: Srinivas Reddy, Poorna, Sri Vishnu
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sarvam (Srinivas Reddy) is desperate to get a transferred back to his home town Kareem Nagar. He thinks his colleague Rani (Poorna) is his lucky for him and begins to woo her in the hope that she will help him get the transfer. And thus begins a hilarious pursuit of happiness.

movieInfo:
Directors: Pete Docter, David Silverman (co-director) | 1 more credit »
Writers: Pete Docter (original story by), Jill Culton (original story by) | 4 more credits »
Stars: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs
Genres: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: Telugu (India)
movieDescription: A city of monsters with no humans called Monstropolis centers around the city’s power company, Monsters, Inc. The lovable, confident, tough, furry blue behemoth-like giant monster named James P. Sullivan (better known as Sulley) and his wisecracking best friend, short, green cyclops monster Mike Wazowski, discover what happens when the real world interacts with theirs in the form of a 2-year-old baby girl dubbed “Boo,” who accidentally sneaks into the monster world with Sulley one night. And now it’s up to Sulley and Mike to send Boo back in her door before anybody finds out, especially two evil villains such as Sulley’s main rival as a scarer, chameleon-like Randall (a monster that Boo is very afraid of), who possesses the ability to change the color of his skin, and Mike and Sulley’s boss Mr. Waternoose, the chairman and chief executive officer of Monsters, Inc.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Krishnareddy Gangadhasuu
Written by: Krishnareddy Gangadhasuu, Padmasri Nandhyala
Starring by: Sudheer Babu Posani, Asmita Sood, Ajay
Genres: Action, Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddhu, a naughty easy going guy falls in love with Indu. But Indu is the sister of Cherry who keeps on protecting his sister from others’ eyes. But on the other hand Cherry he loves Anjali, the sister-in-law of a dangerous man Bujji aka Shankar. How things move among these people, how Siddhu plays with Shankar forms the main story.

movieInfo:
Director: Trinadha Rao Nakkina
Stars: Komal Jha, Varun Sandesh, Bhasha
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie starts off in Rajamundhry, where Varun(Varun Sandesh) a happy go lucky guy loves Preethi(Haaskika) and tries to woo her always. Tired of his proposals, Preethi finally says yes to Varun and accepts his proposal. As time moves on the couple spend some happy times and one fine day Preethi’s dad, Rao(Rao Ramesh) comes to know about his daughters love. An angry Rao decides to get Preethi married to a different guy. An upset Varun decides to elope with …

movieInfo:
Directed by: Michael Bay
Written by: Caspian Tredwell-Owen, Alex Kurtzman
Stars: Scarlett Johansson, Ewan McGregor, Djimon Hounsou
Genres: Action, Adventure, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Lincoln Six Echo is just like everyone else – he’s waiting to go to the Island, the only place left in the world to actually live a life. Thousands of people stay at a facility waiting to go to the Island. It all sounds like paradise, but Lincoln Six Echo soon discovers that there’s actually a sinister purpose going on at that facility and that he must escape – but not before stopping the sinister plan.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Waasudev
Starring by: Sai Ram Shankar, Nikesha Patel, Abhimanyu Singh
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Araku Road Lo story is set on a highway which leads to Vizag. A serial killer starts creating havoc in this route and kills several people. On the other hand, Poturaju(Sai Ram) is a lorry driver who wants to marry a lady constable(Nikisha Patel) and keeps wooing her. The twist in the tale arises when Poturaju accidentally meets the serial killer on the highway and starts traveling with him. What happens during the journey ? Will the serial killer finish Poturaju too ? To know the answers, you need to watch the film on the big screen.

movieName: lena and the Secret of Avalor
movieInfo:
Directed by: Jamie Mitchell
Written by: Craig Gerber, Michael G. Stern
Starring by: Ariel Winter, Aimee Carrero, Jane Fonda
Genres: Animation, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Country: USA
Language: Telugu (India)
movieDescription: Sofia discovers the incredible mystery behind her amulet. Princess Elena from the Kingdom of Avalor has been magically trapped inside Sofia’s amulet, waiting for another Princess to set her free, and Sofia is up to the task!

movieInfo:
Oye Ninne Movie Info:
Directed by: Satyam Challakoti
Starring by: Bharat Margani, Srushti Dange, Nagineedu
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Oye Ninne story is based on the lives of Vishu(Bharath) and Ammulu(Shrusti Dange). Right from their childhood, they grow up together and share a love and hate relation. Love blossoms between them when Ammulu’s marriage is fixed with someone else. What will Vishnu do now? How will the couple realize their love for each other? Will Ammulu get married to someone else? and how does Vishnu win his love? That forms the rest of the story.

movieInfo:

Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Madhu and Siddhu are two people whose paths keep intersecting through out their lives.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Katta Deva
Written by: B.V.S. Ravi

Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Dynamite is the official remake of Tamil film Arima Nambi. The story revolves around the kidnapping of a girl and how the hero tries to hunt down the criminals and save her.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Pavan Sadineni
Written by: Krishna Chaitanya
Starring by: Nara Rohit, Nanditha, Dhanya Balakrishnan
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie revolves around Savithri, who eloped from her house and boards a train to Shiridi. She meets Dr. Rishi, who instantly falls in love with her. Things take a turn when her family comes searching for her. Will they be safe from her family?

movieInfo:
Sarasudu (Saraahsudu) Movie Info:
Directed by: Pandiraj
Starring by: Silambarasan, Nayantara, Andrea Jeremiah
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Shiva (Simbu) is an easy going software engineer who always ends up breaking up with all his lovers. Upset with this, he agrees to tie the knot with the girl (Nayanthara) whom his parents select. A small love story kick starts and the couple happily gets ready for marriage. The twist in the tale arises with the entry of Priya (Andrea). Things become worse between the couple as the marriage is called off. Who is this Priya? What does she have to do with the couple? and how does Shiva manage to win his love back? That forms the rest of the story.

Genres: Drama, Thriller

Directed and written by: Vijayendra Prasad
Star: Neha Hinge, Rajath, Rajiv Kanakala
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Srivalli (Neha Hinge) is the daughter of a renowned scientist Ramachandra (Rajeev Kanakala). Since childhood, she is very much attached to her school friend Gowtham (Rajath Krishna) and her younger brother. Srivalli leaves for the US along with her father and brother, and returns many years later where the father-daughter duo set up a trust fund worth Rs 6000 crore to encourage scientific research. Unfortunately ….

movieInfo:
Directed by: Krishna Kishore
Starring by: Nandamuri Tarakaratna, Revanth, Noel
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ravi(Revanth), Swetha (Lasya), Shashank(Noel) and Seenu(Hemanth) are four best friends who are happy with their respective jobs. One fine day, a person named Nagaraju(Tarak Ratna) who owns an MNC enters the scene and creates a big disturbance in the lives of these four friends….

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ravi Udyawar
Written by: Girish Kohli
Starring by: Sridevi, Akshaye Khanna, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Genres: Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: “MOM” bliss of a biology teacher’s family life in Delhi is shattered when her daughter, Arya (Sajal Ali) is physically assaulted by Jagan (Abhimanyu Singh) and gang.
